title: Apple M1 Pro MacBook Pro - A Long Term User Review
tags: macbook m1 pro vs m2 pro
m1 macbook pro 14 long term review
description: The MacBook Pro is one of the best laptops you can buy right now in 2023 but how does a 2 year old MacBook Pro with the M1 Pro chip shape up right now?  We've been using it as a creator device for things like Resolve, Photoshop and Adobe Premiere for two years straight and there are some amazing benefits but also some bottlenecks.    TIMESTAMPS: 0:00 - My Current MacBook Situation 1:08 - Macbook Pro LONG TERM Build Quality 2:52 - Speakers & Headphone Jack are CLUTCH 3:57 - An (almost) Unbeatable Display 4:56 - Battery Life after 2 Years is... 7:29 - Its FASTER Now!? 8:03 - Thermals & Dust Buildup 8:53 - MacOS Evolution & Some Issues 9:52 - Some Tip & Tricks for Sonoma 11:00 - After 2 Years, Would I Buy it Again?
